dt: {bc}of or relating to the internal affairs of a major political unit (such as a nation)

dt.t: {wi}municipal{/wi} legislation … enacted for the fulfillment of the treaties

dt: {bc}of, relating to, or characteristic of a {d_link|municipality|municipality}

dt.t: a new very {wi}municipal{/wi} variety of dwarf sweet pea

et: Latin {it}municipalis{/it} of a municipality, from {it}municip-, municeps{/it} inhabitant of a municipality, from {it}munus{/it} duty, service + {it}capere{/it} to take {ma}{mat|mean|}, {mat|heave:1|}{/ma}
shortdef: of or relating to the internal affairs of a major political unit (such as a nation)
of, relating to, or characteristic of a municipality

dt: {bc}a security issued by a state or local government or by an authority set up by such a government

shortdef: a security issued by a state or local government or by an authority set up by such a government —usually used in plural

dt: {bc}a borough in England or Wales having powers of self-government limited by its inclusion in an administrative county

shortdef: a borough in England or Wales having powers of self-government limited by its inclusion in an administrative county

dt: {bc}a court that sits in some cities and larger towns and that usually has civil and criminal jurisdiction over cases arising within the municipality

shortdef: a court that sits in some cities and larger towns and that usually has civil and criminal jurisdiction over cases arising within the municipality
